it.polimi.ingsw.cg_8.controller.playerActions

Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg_8.controller.playerActions.PlayerAction
      • it.polimi.ingsw.cg_8.controller.playerActions.Attack

  • public class Attack
extends PlayerAction
    When the input handler gets an action attack, the attack function is called. The attack function instantiate this Class and uses its method to validate the attack.
    Author:
    Alberto Parravicini
